home.text_base_description: A private, exclusive-use garden oasis awaits you! Ideally located on a quiet block in San Francisco's sought-after North of the Panhandle neighborhood off of the Divisadero corridor, 1565 Grove St is a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom 2 level home with a private garden and patio in a 4 unit Edwardian TIC building. Extensively renovated in 2017, this home boasts an abundance of natural light and a spacious open floor plan with serene outlooks onto the garden. The main level consists of a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, formal dining area, and large living room. 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and laundry complete the main level. The lower level is encompassed by the primary suite with a large closet and walk-in stall shower in the bathroom, and direct access to the garden. The home includes radiant heat, 1 car garage parking, and additional storage. With a 97 Walk/98 Bike Score, you are a short walk to Golden Gate Park and amazing shops and restaurants that surround NOPA.

home_facts.Property_Type: Townhouse, Low-Rise (1-3), Unit Above, End Unit, 2 Level, Tenancy In Common
